meanings.definition: A territory ruled by an archduke.
meanings.sent1: The archduchy was a large area governed by the archduke.
meanings.sent2: The archduchy was known for its beautiful landscapes.
meanings.sent3: The archduchy had a funny rule that all citizens had to wear purple hats on Tuesdays.
meanings.sent4: The archduchy stood tall and proud, like a mighty fortress.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the archduchy felt like stepping into a fairy tale kingdom.

meanings.definition: The rank or title of an archduke.
meanings.sent1: He was honored with the archduchy after years of loyal service.
meanings.sent2: The archduchy was passed down through generations of the royal family.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly referred to her new promotion as the archduchy of paperwork.
meanings.sent4: The archduchy symbolized power and authority in the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: Receiving the archduchy felt like wearing a crown of accomplishment.
